summary:
I am a professional with experience in legal practice,dispute resolution, writing,sales and marketing. I am an ambitious professional looking for challenges in corporate social responsibility and bridging the gap between business and technology. I am an ardent fan of the technology sector and believe its symbiotic relationship with every sector makes it vital in today's world.

My demonstrated history of court appearances, research, analysis, review and drafting of contracts, negotiation and arbitration make me versatile and enhance the disciplines within which I can operate 
I am effortlessly able to oversee regulatory and other compliance matters.I also have experience in the  jurisprudence surrounding international law and criminology. 

I have a Masters of Science degree focused on International crimes and criminology and a qualified lawyer in Botswana. I am product of three nations namely Tanzania, where I was born, Botswana where I  lived and worked and the Netherlands where I am a citizen, live and work. This gives me an advantage in multi-cultural understanding and dynamism.
I am a passionate professional who goes beyond my legal area of expertise. To that end, I have recurring freelance work in translation( Dutch to English) and release of company newsletters. I manage my own lifestyle blog/magazine wherein I discuss issues connecting culture, experience and facts.  I also dabble as a writer and facilitator for the ExpatsHaarlem Society.

Gender Justice Campaign addresses underrated areas of gender justice and expands the list of offences that constitute gender crimes.  In advancing this stance I worked with prominent women in the justice sector including the Prosecutor of the International Criminal Court, Ms. Fatou Bensouda and International Criminal Court  Judge Sanji Monageng. Moreover, I was responsible for writing and posting articles for Africa Legal Aid’s Electronic Reporter and organising and participating in Conferences.  In addition I was  the point of contact for the organisation and single-handedly ran the front office.', 'title': 'Legal Associate', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': None, 'name': 'Africa Legal Aid  ', 'logo': None, 'url': None, 'employees': {'start': None, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2012}, 'end': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2013}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'The Hague Area, Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2012}, 'end': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2013}}, 'company': 'Africa Legal Aid  ', 'description': 'As an intern my role encompassed writing, transcribing and editing  articles for Africa Legal Aid’s Electronic Reporter. -  Organising, coordinating and participating in conferences touching on African perspectives to

-    Writing on issues based on the preceding laws  with emphasis on Africa

-    Coordination and contribution to Africa Legal Aid’s Quarterly ( flagship journal)

-    Administrative duties including  and not limited to running the front office, email and telephonic

-  Representing the law firm at legal conferences", 'title': 'Attorney', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': None, 'name': 'Toteng & Company', 'logo': None, 'url': None, 'employees': {'start': None, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2004}, 'end': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2006}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Gaborone, Botswana', 'date': {'start': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2004}, 'end': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2006}}, 'company': 'Toteng & Company', 'description': 'The speciality in this law firm is civil, labour and criminal litigation. Of note is that there was an increase in clients seeking formation of companies and societies since my induction into this firm. This was mainly due to my quick response to matters and achievement of positive results.  This area had been partly neglected by the firm.  l joined the firm , livened up company law practice and generated a sizeable revenue as a result. I single handedly dealt with these cases.', 'title': 'Candidate Attorney', 'employment_type': None}]}]
volunteer_experiences: [{'date': {'start': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2015}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'role': 'Writer, Facilitator and Events hostess', 'company': {'id': None, 'name': 'expatsHaarlem', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E0BAQEKJg2ECfgulQ/company-logo_400_400/0/1519890739310?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=qJsQV2Le3kJLY9_mN0FmjVd2Pm3EVV4k7XKaAfNF2L4', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/expatshaarlem/'}, 'cause': 'ARTS_AND_CULTURE', 'description': 'Expats Haarlem is a platform that assists mostly expatriates to transition into living and working in the Netherlands. As a volunteer writer I showcase and advise on issues on Dutch culture. I consider this very important because I understand that cultural backgrounds vary and as a past foreigner in the Netherlands  I can relate. I was unaware of some of the cultural differences and ways of presentation. Furthermore, I host events wherein I facilitate the interactions and integration of expatriates and dutch people. I also play a public relations role wherein  I present the concept of ExpatsHaarlem at various fairs and introduce people to the work, activities and benefits of the society.  I believe no one should be lonely and depressed due to their failure to mingle in an unfamiliar society. I am a highly passionate about getting people to interact and integrate so as to make life easier for them in a foreign country. '}, {'date': {'start': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'role': ' Student Legal Advisor', 'company': {'id': None, 'name': 'University of Botswana', 'logo': None, 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/school/university-of-botswana/'}, 'cause': 'SOCIAL_SERVICES', 'description': ' At the University of Botswana Legal Clinic I worked as  legal advisor and ad hoc representative of those unable to afford legal fees. In this role I provided legal advice, legal writing skills and direction to persons having to deal with legal matters but had little or no financial resources. This role entailed legal research,drafting, correspondence with lawyers and the courts as well as mediation and negotiation.  Furthermore, I assisted in cases of a sensitive nature requiring therapeutic and re-conciliatory ways of dealing and not necessarily the law. This aspect honed my people skills and has contributed to the confident and supportive professional that I am today. '}, {'date': {'start': {'month': 4, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'role': 'Instructional Facilitator', 'company': {'id': None, 'name': 'NABC', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4D0BAQEFACkGCewOaQ/company-logo_400_400/0/1519935824380?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=0FZahfB0GwPXaahIJjJn_6-WdFiC4zacVyv9g7plk28', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/netherlands-african-business-council-nabc-/'}, 'cause': 'ECONOMIC_EMPOWERMENT', 'description': None}, {'date': {'start': {'month': 4, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'role': 'Instructional Facilitator', 'company': {'id': None, 'name': 'Stichting Afrikadag', 'logo': None, 'url': None}, 'cause': 'CIVIL_RIGHTS', 'description': None}]
